g.text: Create a VPC with IPFamily set to `ipv6`
Create a VPC with IPFamily set to `ipv6`
Create IPv6 Pool and assign IPv6 CIDR to new VPC
"At this point, CIDR and Pool aren't yet
We must Describe it to get that."
`DescribeVpcs` to get IPv6 CIDR and Pool ID
return VPC with IPv6 CIDR and Pool now set
patch aws-node with IPv6 environment properties
update aws-node DaemonSet with new environment properties
